labels.max-releases: Maximum number of releases in the selected batch

inventory-delete.title: Confirm Delete
inventory-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this quote?

inventory-save.title: Save Changes
inventory-save.message: The inventory has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

fulfillment-delete.title: Confirm Delete
fulfillment-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this fulfillment center?

inventoryWidget.title: Inventory
inventoryWidget.blade-subtitle: Select a fulfillment center to edit the inventory in

geoPoint.title: Location
geoPoint.description: Please use the following format: lat,long, e.g. 41.40338,2.17403, with no space after the comma separator.

outerId.title: Outer ID
outerId.placeholder: Please enter ID in an outer system
outerId.description: Unique ID for connecting the fulfillment center with an outer system.

ExportImport.PageSize.description: Providing high values may lead to slow performance
ExportImport.PageSize.title: Page size being used for Export / Import

LogInventoryChanges.title: Log inventory changes
LogInventoryChanges.description: Log product stock changes into the platform operation log. This might impact database size in case the product stock gets changed often.

Enable.title: Enable event-based indexing for inventory entities
Enable.description: Any change to an inventory entity will trigger a background task that will apply these changes to the search index.
